completedHtml: Great work! An introduction to Mindfulness is ready for you now.

elements.name: introduction
elements.html:
Welcome to the next phase of the study

The intervention you have been allocated to is: Mindfulness

Over the next two weeks, you'll learn about mindfulness: paying attention to the present moment, on purpose, without judgement.

We'll ask you to practise one brief (3-5 min) mindfulness exercise each day.

elements.name: CEQ-Panel1
CEQ1
elements.title: Right now, how logical does the idea of using this app to improve your distress seem to you?
In the next two questions we would like you to indicate how much you believe, right now, that this self-help app will help improve your feelings of distress.

elements.name: CEQ-Panel2
CEQ6
elements.title: By the end of the study, how much improvement in your distress do you really feel will have occurred?
Close your eyes for a few moments and try to identify what you really feel about this app and its likely success.
